We the undersigned note that

1.	the DWP funeral payment is £700

2.	a typical funeral costs £3 500

3.	the DWP payment has been the same for 10 years

4.	funeral costs are rising by 7.1% a year – more than 3 times inflation

5.	funeral poverty is up 121% since 2010

6.	local councils are arranging many more funeral under the Public Health Act 1948

We call on DWP to make a substantial increase in the funeral payment and index to funeral costs in future
